GDriver_PATH = "/Users/sebas/PycharmProjects/wecpsie/webdrivers/chromedriver"

[docs]def create_data_dir(directory):
    """
    Creates a new directory. This function uses ``os.makedirs``.

    Parameters
    ----------
    directory: str, A string that represents the path where the directory whill be created.
    """
    if not os.path.exists(directory):
        print("Creating data directory: " + directory)
        os.makedirs(directory)
